title: The camera app on the pixel crashes every time I try to take a picture. Why?
content:
I haven't been able to take a picture on my pixel 2 in a week.

I think it started after upgrading to Android 10. The same problem persists in safe mode and after I've cleared the cache/memory, uninstalled the update / reinstalled update, etc.

I've tried everything. Please help.

I hope this isn't Google's way of forcing an upgrade to the pixel 4..
